message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic deal on this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $250.
I'm really interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, $120 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer you the product for $180. This is my best price, and I'm confident you'll find it's a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $180 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for the product. Can you consider that price?
